text.headline: Welcome to TimelineJS
text.text:
TimelineJS is an open-source tool that enables you to build visually-rich interactive timelines and is available in 40 languages.

You're looking at an example of one right now.

Click on the arrow to the right to learn more.

media.caption: Screenshot from TimelineJS Embed Generator tool (see below)

text.headline: It's Easy to Make Your Own Timeline
text.text: The TimelineJS Embed Generator makes it easy to add a timeline to your own site. Just copy our Google Spreadsheet template, add your events as rows in the spreadsheet, and use our generator tool to generate the HTML you need to add to your site.

media.caption: Screenshot from TimelineJS Embed Generator tool (see below)

text.headline: Illustrate your Timeline with photos, videos, tweets and more.
text.text: Timeline can automatically pull in photos, videos from YouTube or Vimeo, tweets, wikipedia entries, and many other media types to help tell your story.

text.headline: YouTube video
text.text: To add a YouTube video, just add a link to it in the media field. No embedding necessary. http://youtu.be/lIvftGgps24

media.caption: A Trip to the Moon / Le Voyage dans la lune

text.headline: Wikipedia
text.text: Add a link to a Wikipedia entry in the media field to show an excerpt alongside your text.

media.url: “You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose. You're on your own, and you know what you know. And you are the guy who'll decide where to go.”

text.headline: Blockquote
text.text:
This is an example of a blockquote.
<blockquote>“Just use html blockquotes in the media field.”</blockquote>

text.headline: Website
text.text: This is an example of a website. Just paste a link to the site in the media field.

text.headline: Google Map
text.text: Google Maps are easy too. Just add the link to the map in the media field.

text.headline: Flickr
text.text: To add a Flickr photo, just paste a link to the photo page in the media field. Example: http://www.flickr.com/photos/zachwise/7074630607/

text.headline: A Tweet
text.text: To add a tweet, just paste a link to the tweet stats in the media field. Example: http://twitter.com/alykat/status/164184609519697920

text.headline: Vimeo
text.text: Just add a link to the video in the media field. Example: https://vimeo.com/33211636

text.headline: SoundCloud
text.text: Just add a link to the track in the media field.

text.headline: Get started!
text.text: Use the generator form to make your first timeline now.
